name: Island Master
description:
Description:
Welcome to "Island Master," a captivating top-down city builder that challenges you to create and manage your very own island paradise.

Key Features:

Procedural Generation: No two islands are the same from the shape of the island and the distribution of resources all the way down to the color of the grass and water.

Top-Down Design: Take control from a bird's-eye view and watch your island come to life. Every structure, road, and citizen is under your watchful gaze. Use your strategic acumen to maximize efficiency and aesthetic appeal.

Resource Management: Island Master features accessible and simple resource management mechanics. Have citizens collect resources or collect them yourself. You can even trade those resources with other islands.

Joy and Faith Management: Citizens' happiness and faith are vital to the success of your island society. Construct entertainment venues and spiritual centers to satisfy their joy and faith requirements, fostering a harmonious community. Keep an eye on the needs of your people to maintain a steady population.

Embark on a journey of creation, and growth in Island Master. As the mastermind behind every structure and decision, your leadership will determine the fate of your island paradise.
